about_the_game:
The Deluxe Outing Pack is a bundle that combines the Thrilling Outfit Pack, Excited Outfit Pack, and Deluxe Outing Pack Bonus.

The Deluxe Outing Pack includes:
Thrilling Outfit Pack
• Fancy Set
- Loid's Fancy Tuxedo
- Anya and Yor's Fancy Dress
- Bond's Pearl Bow
• Work & Undercover Set
- Loid's White Coat
- Anya's Undercover Suit, Undercover Bandana, and Undercover Sunglasses
- Yor's Uniform
- Bond's Goggles
• In-Game Bonus Items:
- Mr. Chimera Statue (Earn 2x Eurekas)
- 10,000 PP

Excited Outfit Pack
• Denim Set
- Loid's Peanut T-shirt & Jeans
- Anya and Yor's Overalls
- Bond's Denim Bow
• Punk Set
- Loid, Anya, and Yor's Punk Outfit
- Bond's Punk Collar
• In-Game Bonus Items:
- Penguin Statue (Earn 2x PP)
- 10,000 PP

Deluxe Outing Pack Bonus:
Anya's Bond Stan Set
- Anya's Bond Dress
- Anya's Bond Hat

*Please note that contents are included in the Deluxe Edition and can be purchased separately. Please be mindful of duplicate purchases.
*Custom outfits will not be displayed during certain minigames and cutscenes.
*Purchase bonus content may be distributed at a later date.
detailed_description:
The Deluxe Outing Pack is a bundle that combines the Thrilling Outfit Pack, Excited Outfit Pack, and Deluxe Outing Pack Bonus.

The Deluxe Outing Pack includes:
